snippet: In 1912, the first two of 3,000 trees that the mayor of Tokyo gave to Washington were planted around the Tidal Basin. The centennial will be marked by the National Cherry Blossom Festival, whose typical 16-day run (nationalcherryblossomfestival.org)...
abstract: In 1912, the first two of 3,000 trees that the mayor of Tokyo gave to Washington were planted around the Tidal Basin. The centennial will be marked by the National Cherry Blossom Festival, whose typical 16-day run (nationalcherryblossomfestival.org) will be extended to 5 weeks this year.

headline.main: Cherry Blossom Deals Bloom for Centennial
